title: How to Find Your Bus
en: Use the PTV Journey Planner to find your bus route. Enter your starting point and destination, then filter results by bus. This helps you plan the best route for your trip.

title: Check Bus Stop Information
en: At the bus stop, check the route number and direction on the stop sign. Make sure you are waiting on the correct side for your direction. This helps you board the right bus for your journey.

title: Boarding the Bus
en: Signal the driver if needed as your bus arrives. Board through the front door and touch your Myki card on the reader. This ensures you pay the correct fare and are ready for your trip.

title: Bus Safety Tips
en: Always sit down or hold the handrail while the bus is moving. Offer priority seats to people who need them, such as the elderly or those with disabilities. Staying safe and considerate makes travel better for everyone.

title: Requesting Your Stop
en: Press the red ‘STOP’ button before your stop to let the driver know you want to get off. This gives the driver time to safely stop the bus. Always prepare to leave a few moments before your stop.

title: Getting Off the Bus
en: When you reach your stop, alight safely and touch off your Myki card at the reader near the door. This ensures you pay the correct fare. Watch your step as you leave the bus.

title: Printable Bus Guides
en: Official bus guides are available as PDFs in multiple languages. These guides explain how to travel by bus in Victoria. Download and print them for easy reference.
